properties.headline: Freezing Fog Advisory issued January 30 at 12:49AM CST until January 30 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Lubbock TX
properties.description:
* WHAT...Visibility at or below one mile in freezing fog.

* WHERE...Cochran and Yoakum Counties.

* WHEN...Until 9 AM CST Thursday

* IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility and
potential frost on bridges.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Fog will spread west with time across the
northern South Plains and far southern Texas Panhandle.
Visibilities will rapidly drop when the fog develops.
properties.instruction:
If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of
distance ahead of you. Also, be alert for frost on bridge decks
causing slippery roads.

NWSheadline: FREEZING FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IS CANCELLED
